text: Chalus can refer to: == Places == * Châlus, a commune in the Haute-Vienne département of France * Chalus, Puy-de-Dôme, a commune in the Puy-de-Dôme département of France * Chalus, Iran, a city in Mazandaran province of Iran * Chalus County, an administrative subdivision of Mazandaran Province of Iran * Chaloos River, in Iran == People == * Matěj Chaluš, Czech footballer == See also == * Calus (disambiguation) * Callus (disambiguation)
title: Chalus
